function.description:
Changes the value of a given cell to the provided value.
If the parameter `formula` is true then the `value` is treated and stored as formula, otherwise the `value` is stored as text. Default is false.
function.deprecated:
Deprecated because the purpose of this construct might be unclear.
Can be replaced by Excel.setCellFormula or Excel.setCellValue.

example.title: Usage

function.tags: Excel, cell, change, value, set, formula
